Author: ToastBusters21
Text: That's a really good point. The entire conversation was with good intentions, it was just the disordered part of my brain that was saying it's a trap even though I know he wants me to be healthy.

Author: ketothrowaway95
Text: I try my best to brush it off knowing that they didn’t mean to hurt me. I feel like intention matters a lot - he probably legitimately thought he was giving you a compliment.   My partner pokes fun at me sometimes and it hurts, yesterday I had my first consult at a new gym and he legit said “you should tell them you want the smallest butt because it seems like it’s smaller every time I see you” like thanks for the insecurity bro
